00001 #include"PGBasics.hh"
00002 #include"Sampler.hh"
00003 
00004 using namespace std;
00005 
00006 namespace libpg {
00007 
00008 int Sampler::discrete(Vector& pdf, double cdf) {
00009 
00010     double thresh = random()/(double)RAND_MAX*cdf;
00011     double partialCDF = 0.0;
00012 
00013     Vector::iterator i;
00014     for (i = pdf.begin(); i != pdf.end(); i++) {
00015         partialCDF += *i;
00016         if (partialCDF >= thresh) break; 
00017     }
00018 
00019     if (i == pdf.end()) {
00020         // Should never reach the end. Although sometimes happens if 
00021         // approximator output goes NaN
00022         cerr<<"!! Sampler broke: pdf="<<pdf<<" cdf="<<cdf<<" thresh="<<thresh<<" partialCDF="<<partialCDF<<endl; 
00023         free((void*)1);
00024         throw std::runtime_error("Sampler broke\n");
00025     }
00026     assert(i.index() < pdf.size());
00027     return i.index();
00028 
00029 }
00030 }
